short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never forget a password again! PassWatch will make your life easier and passwords safer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The special Secure Me feature allows you to log out remotely and wipe your browser history.

• Never forget a password again with secure automatic login
• Protect your accounts by generating strong and unique password
• Access your accounts from all your devices
• Logout from every website and secure your browsing history remotely

We use modern cryptography to make sure that no one else except you can access your personal accounts. PassWatch utilizes AES-256 encryption implemented with
salted hashing. All your sensitive data are encrypted and decrypted locally on your machine.

PassWatch only stores and synchronizes encrypted files, so it is impossible
for us or anyone who doesn't know your master password to access your passwords, credit card information or notes. Only you know your master password, PassWatch never has it or sees it. We've invested considerable time and effort with the aim to provide you the best product combining top security, maximum convenience, and low system footprint.

We’re adding features an improving service standard as we go. If you are not satisfied with the extension, you can remove it at any time from your browser.
By using PassWatch, you agree to our terms of service https://passwatch.co/terms-of-service/ and privacy policy
https://passwatch.co/privacy-policy/. We’re committed to your privacy and keeping you safe in the online world. If you’re worried, connect with us here or on social media.
